availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, sheriff. Maryland native. Union County resident in 1825. Married in 1828. Elected Sheriff of the Union County Court in 1854. Elected Sheriff of the Union County Court as a Know Nothing in 1856. Unsuccessful Know Nothing candidate for sheriff of the Union County court in 1858. Elected Sheriff of the Union County Court as a Unionist in 1862 and 1865.

ab.bibl: History of Union County, Kentucky, (Evansville, IN: Courier Co., Printers, Binders and Engravers, 1886), 84-88, 193.
